page.title: 16"LIFE IN OUR TIME" - Survey
page.content: {38 households returned questionaire. No. in Brackets = approx no. to home. Radios (2.9); Colour t/v.'s (1.3); Mono t/v.'s (0.4); Telephones (1.2); Computers (0.36); Daily newspapers (0.9); Weekly News (1.3); Motor - vehicles (1.4): T.V. switched on daily 3.8 hours, Radio - 2.7 hours. Amateur radios - Nil; 26 grow own vegetables; {14 work in Whiteparish; 41 work out of {the area. { {Lived in Whiteparish for }0-5 yrs.> 5; 5-10 yrs.>13; 10-20 yrs.>7; 20-40 yrs.>3; More than 40.>1; All life >5. { {School Survey }- PETS:- 22 had cats; 19 - dogs; 5 - tortoises; 5 - budgies; 9 - rabbits; 3 - guinea pigs; 2-gerbils; 12 - fish; 4 - ponies; 1 - mouse.{63 children in survey.
